ect:=A0 Am I headed in the right direction here?

ys an instance of jOptionPane class
to confirm a selection the user has jus=
t made. In my junit test
method, I want to be able to select and close the =

ame approach on jOptionPane? I assume I would look

 button in the source and refer to it in the

 more direct approach to the problem?

 jOption Pane using Junit.
